Title: [Autism Out Loud: Life with a Child on the Spectrum, from Diagnosis to Young Adulthood](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9780778368366) (Hardcover)
Author: Kate Swenson
Synopsis: In this moving narrative of resilience and pure love, three mothers share their experiences and learnings about life alongside autism.
